page.title: 15Our Churches
page.content: There is a great choice of churches in our area. As well as the Anglican, Roman Chatholic and Methodist churches there is also the Salvation Army and the Spritualist Church. The oldest church is Penshaw All Saint's, built in 1746 as a Chapel of Ease and becoming a parish church in 1838. The church has five stained glass windows, one is a{memorial}to the local men who died in World War I and II.Inside the church can be found a stone from the{Great Pyramids in {Egypt.}The bell is rung each morning except for Friday. St Aidan's church can be found in Herrington. The church was built in 1886 but is in a very poor state of repair.The vicar the Reverend Varley said that the church is to be knocked down in 1986 and it is going to be {rebuilt}the same year.
